scripts.installDeps: cd node_modules && cp dompurify/dist/purify.js ../resources/js/vendor && cp dompurify/dist/purify.min.js ../resources/js/vendor && cp handlebars/dist/handlebars.js ../resources/js/vendor && cp handlebars/dist/handlebars.min.js ../resources/js/vendor && cp @mozilla/readability/Readability.js ../resources/js/vendor
